name: Yooka-Laylee: Buddy Duo Pack
description:
Yooka-Laylee: Buddy Duo Bundle includes:
- Yooka-Laylee base game
- Yooka-Laylee and the Impossible Lair base game


Enjoy two great adventures in one with the Buddy Duo Bundle!


Yooka-Laylee is an open-world platformer from genre veterans, Playtonic Games. Explore huge, beautiful worlds, meet (and beat) an unforgettable cast of characters and horde a vault-load of collectibles as buddy-duo Yooka and Laylee embark on an epic adventure to thwart corporate creep Capital B!
  • INTRODUCING OUR NEW BUDDY DUO: Yooka and Laylee boast an awesome arsenal of abilities built for platforming fun
  • CARVE YOUR OWN PATH: Unlock new moves, expand your favourite worlds and equip Tonic gampley modifiers. Every player will have a unique experience
  • A DREAM SOUNDTRACK: David Wise (Donkey Kong Country) and Grant Kirkhope (Banjo-Kazooie) combine for a melodic masterpiece!
  • AND A WHOLE LOT MORE: Discover unique boss fights, mine cart challenges, retro-tastic Arcade games, quiz shows and more than 8 unique multiplayer games!


Yooka-Laylee and the Impossible Lair is a brand-new platform adventure from some of the key creative talent behind 'Donkey Kong Country'. The colourful buddy duo must run, jump and roll their way through a series of challenging 2D levels, face a puzzling 3D Overworld filled with secrets and rally the Royal Beettalion to take down Capital B and his Impossible Lair!
  • THE BUDDY DUO IS BACK: Yooka & Laylee are back in a brand-new platform adventure from Playtonic Games.
  • 2.5D PLATFORMING: Each level offers beautiful, rich visuals with detail and depth.
  • EXPLORE A 3D OVERWORLD: Unlock more 2D levels by completing objectives and puzzles, rescue the Royal Beettalion bees and find collectibles.
  • ALTERNATE LEVEL STATES: Hook up electricity, submerge them in water, freeze or literally flip them upside down for radically altered challenges!
  • TONICS: Tonics which offer a whole host of new experiences. From super speed and big-head mode, to environmental visual effects, tonics mix up the way you play!
